Posts.Content: Jan 25, 2008 05:07AM Voo wrote: I had a fibroadenoma when I was your age.  It was pretty big and everyone could feel it, but didn't show up on a mammo at all.  I had an ultrasound and that showed it.  Ultrasounds really are better for showing cysts and fibroadenomas.  The surgeon went ahead and took it out because it had been there a really long time (like 3 or 4 years) and was growing.  Otherwise, they leave them alone, because they usually disappear on their own.  I agree with Beesie, another ultrasound is a good idea.  If the doctor does it, she can tell you right away what she sees.
